Deprecated functions in orderly2. These functions still work (for now) but will be removed shortly. Please update your code.

Source: R/deprecated.R, R/location.R
orderly2-deprecated.Rd

  • orderly_location_pull_packet; please use orderly_location_pull()

  • orderly_location_pull_metadata; please use orderly_location_fetch_metadata()

Usage

orderly_location_pull_metadata(...)

orderly_location_pull_packet(...)

Arguments

...

Arguments forwarded to the new version

Value

See the linked pages above for the current return type.
